story_99_00300/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Your timing is excelente today!
story_99_00300/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’d like to share a wee bit of my research with
you... I made a new discovery that will allow you
to expand on the power of your sync stone!
story_99_00300/2401_1001_0300_10:
With the help of sync orbs, you and your partner
Pokémon will be able to achieve even greater
feats in no time! Ganbatte ne!
